3.title: The Selenium Solution
3.plot: Four scientists, one from Germany, two from the UK, one American, use a synchrotron to discover the molecule that uses selenium to neutralize arsenic. Will selenium-rich lentils from North America save millions of Asians from being poisoned by arsenic in their drinking water?

4.title: Darryl Jesse
4.plot: Darryl Jesse quit a lucrative engineering job in California's Wireless Valley because he wanted to see "a windmill on every farm." The politics, economics and environmental issues surrounding small wind turbines are complex, but one man can make a difference.

5.title: Steven Franklin
5.plot: Steven Franklin is a world authority on environmental remote sensing, using satellite imagery to track man's effect on nature. Follow Dr. Franklin and a team of dedicated scientists as they track the effects of the oil industry on Grizzly habitat (the "charismatic carnivore").

imdb.plot outline: Mindfield pulls back the curtain to reveal the new wizards behind science and technology discoveries in Canada. We explore many disciplines within this genre; agro-bio research, medicine, academic research, alternative energy and the frontiers of research in commercially viable inventions. Canadian innovators on the global stage.
imdb.title: Mindfield
plot: _Mindfield_ (qv) pulls back the curtain to reveal the new wizards behind science and technology discoveries in Canada.
